### Educational Qualifications

```{r}
data1 <- data_new %>% group_by(Educational_qualifications) %>% summarise(n = n())

fig1 <- plot_ly(x = data1$n,y = data1$Educational_qualifications,type = "bar", color = data1$Educational_qualifications, domain = list(x = c(0, 0.5), y = c(0, 1))) %>% 
  layout(yaxis = list(categoryorder = "total ascending"))
fig1
```
